summary: Jafar comes for revenge on Aladdin, using a foolish thief and Iago's treachery to find a way back into power.
cast: Jason Alexander|Jonathan Freeman|Jeff Bennett|Gilbert Gottfried|Val Bettin|Brad Kane|Liz Callaway|Linda Larkin|Dan Castellaneta|B.J. Ward|Jim Cummings|Scott Weinger|Frank Welker|Jerry Houser|Maurice LaMarche
director: Directors: Toby Shelton, Tad Stones | 1 more credit Â»
title: El retorno de Jafar
